description: The Public Works and Government Services Canada  has a requirement for the  furnishing  of all necessary labour, material, tools and equipment to supply, install, provide testing, adjusting, balancing  and commissioning of 12 new Variable Frequency Drives (VFD) and all necessary equipment (including motors, pumps, line and load reactors, etc.) for 5 existing Air Handling Units (AHU) and 2  chilled water pumps.
